headline: What Amphenol (APH)'s Addition of Linde CEO Sanjiv Lamba to Its Board Means For Shareholders
summary: Amphenol Corporation recently expanded its board of directors to nine members by appointing Sanjiv Lamba, the current CEO of Linde plc, who brings nearly three decades of global industrial and engineering leadership experience. By adding a sitting chief executive from a large, globally diversified manufacturing company, Amphenol appears to be reinforcing its governance bench and international expansion ambitions with deep operational expertise. We’ll now examine how Sanjiv Lamba’s...
